pinyin: zhè ge jiù shì wǒ fáng jiān de mén
zh-Hans: 这个就是我房间的门
en: This is the door of my room

pinyin: tā méi yǒu shén me tè sè
zh-Hans: 它没有什么特色
en: There’s nothing special

pinyin: jiù shì quán bái de yí shàn mén
zh-Hans: 就是全白的一扇门
en: It’s just an all-white door

pinyin: diàn dēng kāi guān
zh-Hans: 电灯开关
en: light switch

pinyin: zhè shì wǒ zài A mazon shàng miàn mǎi de dēng
zh-Hans: 这是我在Amazon上面买的灯
en: This is a light I bought on Amazon

pinyin: yòng lái zhuāng shì de
zh-Hans: 用来装饰的
en: for decoration

pinyin: qí shí rú guǒ nǐ kàn tā de shí tǐ
zh-Hans: 其实如果你看它的实体
en: Actually, if you look at it in person,

pinyin: tā shì lán sè de
zh-Hans: 它是蓝色的
en: It's blue

pinyin: dàn shì wǒ bù zhī dào wèi shén me zài jìng tóu qián miàn
zh-Hans: 但是我不知道为什么在镜头前面
en: but I don't know why on camera

pinyin: tā jiù biàn chéng zǐ sè de le
zh-Hans: 它就变成紫色的了
en: it's purple

pinyin: zhè ge shì wǒ de chuáng
zh-Hans: 这个是我的床
en: This is my bed

pinyin: qí shí yì kāi shǐ wǒ bù shì mǎi zhè ge mián bèi
zh-Hans: 其实一开始我不是买这个棉被
en: Actually, this comforter wasn’t the first one I bought

pinyin: suī rán wǒ yì kāi shǐ jiù kàn dào zhè ge mián bèi jiù hěn xǐ huan
zh-Hans: 虽然我一开始就看到这个棉被就很喜欢
en: Although I liked it from the beginning when I saw it,

pinyin: dàn shì nà shí hou pà zhè ge mián bèi tài dà le
zh-Hans: 但是那时候怕这个棉被太大了
en: I was afraid that it was too big

pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ jiù xuǎn le yí gè bǐ jiào xiǎo de
zh-Hans: 所以我就选了一个比较小的
en: so I chose a smaller one

pinyin: kā fēi sè de mián bèi ba
zh-Hans: 咖啡色的棉被吧
en: A brown comforter

pinyin: rán hòu wǒ jiù jué de yán sè zhěng gè hěn bù dā
zh-Hans: 然后我就觉得颜色整个很不搭
en: then I felt like the colors didn't match well together

pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ hòu lái jiù bǎ nà ge mián bèi ná qù tuì huò
zh-Hans: 所以我后来就把那个棉被拿去退货
en: So I returned that one

pinyin: rán hòu huàn chéng zhè ge
zh-Hans: 然后换成这个
en: and replaced it with this one

pinyin: zhè liǎng gè zhěn tou shì mǎi zhè ge mián bèi de shí hou fù de
zh-Hans: 这两个枕头是买这个棉被的时候附的
en: These two pillows came together with the comforter

pinyin: zhè ge zhěn tou tào yě shì
zh-Hans: 这个枕头套也是
en: and so was this pillowcase

pinyin: bù guò zhè lǐ miàn de zhěn tou shì wǒ zì jǐ mǎi de
zh-Hans: 不过这里面的枕头是我自己买的
en: But I bought the pillow inside

pinyin: zài lái kàn yī xià shū zhuō
zh-Hans: 再来看一下书桌
en: and then let’s look at the desk

pinyin: wǒ zhù jìn lái de shí hou tā jiù fù de zhuō zi
zh-Hans: 我住进来的时候它就附的桌子
en: It came with the house

pinyin: zhè ge tái dēng hái mǎn pián yi de
zh-Hans: 这个台灯还满便宜的
en: This lamp is quite cheap

pinyin: hǎo xiàng shì zài T arget...
zh-Hans: 好像是在Target...
en: I think I bought it from Target…

pinyin: duì, zài T arget mǎi de
zh-Hans: 对，在Target买的
en: Yeah, it’s from Target

pinyin: zhè ge yīng gāi yě shì zài T arget mǎi de
zh-Hans: 这个应该也是在Target买的
en: I think I also got this from Target

pinyin: tā shì jiǎ huā
zh-Hans: 它是假花
en: They're fake flowers

pinyin: wǒ jué de zhè ge pén zāi hěn yǒu yì shù gǎn
zh-Hans: 我觉得这个盆栽很有艺术感
en: I think this potted plant is very artistic

pinyin: wǒ hěn xǐ huan
zh-Hans: 我很喜欢
en: I love it

pinyin: zhè ge ne, shì wǒ zài IU shè tuán bó lǎn huì ná de
zh-Hans: 这个呢，是我在IU社团博览会拿的
en: I picked this one up at the IU club fair (IU: Indiana University)

pinyin: wǒ zài lǐ miàn fàng le yī xiē zhǒng zi
zh-Hans: 我在里面放了一些种子
en: I’ve put some seeds in it

pinyin: dàn shì tā yī zhí méi yǒu cháng chū lái
zh-Hans: 但是它一直没有长出来
en: but it never grows

pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng kuài yào fàng qì tā le lol
zh-Hans: 我已经快要放弃它了 lol
en: I’m just about ready to give up lol

pinyin: jiù bǎ tā fàng zài zhè biān zhuāng shì ba

en: I’ll just put it here for decoration

pinyin: rán hòu zhè ge nào zhōng
zh-Hans: 然后这个闹钟
en: And this alarm clock

pinyin: rú guǒ dà jiā kàn le wǒ dì yī gè vlog
zh-Hans: 如果大家看了我第一个vlog
en: If you've seen my first vlog

pinyin: yīng gāi jué de hěn shú xī ba
zh-Hans: 应该觉得很熟悉吧
en: It might look familiar to you

zh-Hans: 它就是我第一个vlog出现的第一个画面
en: It shows up at the beginning of my first vlog

zh-Hans: 我把它从台湾带过来了

pinyin: rán hòu zhè ge shì mài kè fēng
zh-Hans: 然后这个是麦克风

pinyin: yě shì wǒ cóng Tái wān dài lái de

pinyin: zhè biān yǒu yī xiē shū

pinyin: zài Měi guó mǎi de

zh-Hans: 就它其实原本可以盖起来

pinyin: dà gài zuò gè sān 、 sì gè xiǎo shí

pinyin: wǒ de yāo jiù chāo jí suān tòng de

pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ jiù hòu lái zài A mazon shàng miàn mǎi le yí gè diàn zi

pinyin: jiù jiě jué le zhè ge wèn tí!

pinyin: tā ràng zhè ge yǐ zi bǐ jiào gāo yī diǎn

pinyin: ér qiě zuò qǐ lai yě bǐ jiào shū fu

pinyin: wǒ zhēn de hǎo xǐ huan zhè miàn jìng zi

en: I really like this mirror

en: and here is my dresser

en: um, just some clothes over here.

pinyin: wǒ de yùn dòng yī, hái yǒu dōng tiān de fā rè yī

pinyin: hái yǒu yī xiē kù zi

pinyin: zhè xià miàn jiù shì yī xiē...

zh-Hans: 也是一些杂物

zh-Hans: 所以这一格还没有用到
en: I haven't used this drawer

pinyin: wǒ jiù bǎ tā ná lái fàng yī xiē píng cháng bǐ jiào méi yǒu yòng dào de dōng xi

pinyin: zhè ge shì pāi yǐng piàn de shí hou kě yǐ yòng de bǔ guāng dēng
zh-Hans: 这个是拍影片的时候可以用的补光灯
en: These are film lights

pinyin: bù guò wǒ hái méi yǒu yòng guò tā
zh-Hans: 不过我还没有用过它
en: but I haven't used them yet

pinyin: suǒ yǐ bù zhī dào tā de xiào guǒ zěn me yàng
zh-Hans: 所以不知道它的效果怎么样
en: so I don't know how well it works

pinyin: rán hòu yī guì shàng miàn jiù shì yī xiē xiǎo bǎi shì
zh-Hans: 然后衣柜上面就是一些小摆饰
en: And there are some decorations on top of the dresser

pinyin: zhè ge shì wǒ zài Goodwill mǎi de
zh-Hans: 这个是我在Goodwill买的
en: I bought this at Goodwill

pinyin: wǒ jué de mǎn kě 'ài de
zh-Hans: 我觉得满可爱的
en: I think it's pretty cute

pinyin: xiān rén zhǎng
zh-Hans: 仙人掌
en: Cactus

pinyin: zhè ge shì wǒ shì yǒu bāng wǒ jiǎn huí lai de
zh-Hans: 这个是我室友帮我捡回来的
en: My roommate picked this up for me

pinyin: shàng miàn zhè ge yě shì zài Goodwill mǎi de
zh-Hans: 上面这个也是在Goodwill买的
en: I also bought this one at Goodwill

pinyin: hòu miàn shì kuò xiāng píng
zh-Hans: 后面是扩香瓶
en: It’s a reed diffuser in the back

pinyin: qí shí wǒ bù shì yīng gāi huì tè bié qù mǎi kuò xiāng píng lái yòng de rén
zh-Hans: 其实我不是应该会特别去买扩香瓶来用的人
en: I don’t usually buy reed diffusers

pinyin: dàn shì yīn wèi wǒ gāng bān jìn zhè ge fáng jiān de shí hou
zh-Hans: 但是因为我刚搬进这个房间的时候
en: but because when I first moved into this room

pinyin: wǒ jué de yǒu yì gǔ hěn qí guài de wèi dao
zh-Hans: 我觉得有一股很奇怪的味道
en: I felt like there was a kind of weird smell

pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ hòu lái jiù hái shi qù mǎi le kuò xiāng píng
zh-Hans: 所以我后来就还是去买了扩香瓶
en: so eventually I went to buy this reed diffuser

pinyin: xiàn zài jiù jiě jué le zhè ge wèn tí le
zh-Hans: 现在就解决了这个问题了
en: and now the problem is solved

pinyin: wǒ hěn xǐ huan xiàn zài fáng jiān de wèi dao
zh-Hans: 我很喜欢现在房间的味道
en: I love the smell of the room now

pinyin: lái gěi dà jiā jiè shào yī xià wǒ hěn xǐ huan de bǎi shì
zh-Hans: 来给大家介绍一下我很喜欢的摆饰
en: Here is a decoration that I really like

pinyin: zhè ge!
zh-Hans: 这个！
en: This!

pinyin: yīn wèi tā shì Grace de kāi tóu zì mǔ
zh-Hans: 因为他是Grace的开头字母
en: because it's the first letter of “Grace”,

pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ jiù jué de shì hěn yǒu yì yì de bǎi shì
zh-Hans: 所以我就觉得是很有意义的摆饰
en: I thought it was very meaningful

pinyin: suǒ yǐ jiù mǎi xià lai le
zh-Hans: 所以就买下来了
en: so I bought it

pinyin: rán hòu zhè ge yòu shì yì zhū jiǎ de zhí wù
zh-Hans: 然后这个又是一株假的植物
en: And then this is another fake plant

pinyin: yīn wèi wǒ zhēn de hěn bù huì zhào gu zhí wù
zh-Hans: 因为我真的很不会照顾植物
en: because I'm really bad at taking care of plants

pinyin: yīn wèi wǒ cháng cháng kě néng huì máng dào wàng jì jiāo shuǐ
zh-Hans: 因为我常常可能会忙到忘记浇水
en: I often forget to water plants when I’m busy

pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ jiù xiǎng shuō, hǎo ba... hái shi mǎi jiǎ de hǎo le
zh-Hans: 所以我就想说，好吧...还是买假的好了
en: so I thought, well… I'll just buy a fake one

pinyin: yǐ shàng jiù shì wǒ de room tour
zh-Hans: 以上就是我的room tour
en: That's all for my room tour

pinyin: wǒ de fáng jiān suī rán méi yǒu hěn dà
zh-Hans: 我的房间虽然没有很大
en: Even though my room isn't very big,

pinyin: dàn shì wǒ zhēn de hěn xǐ huan tā de gé jú
zh-Hans: 但是我真的很喜欢它的格局
en: I really like the layout

pinyin: yóu qí shì wǒ de shū zhuō qián miàn yǒu yí shàn chuāng hu
zh-Hans: 尤其是我的书桌前面有一扇窗户
en: Especially since I have a window in front of my desk

pinyin: duì yú yào pāi yǐng piàn de wǒ lái shuō
zh-Hans: 对于要拍影片的我来说
en: which is really convenient for

pinyin: zhè zhēn de shì fēi cháng dì fāng biàn
zh-Hans: 这真的是非常地方便
en: shooting videos

pinyin: yīn wèi rú guǒ shì zǎo shang pāi shè de huà
zh-Hans: 因为如果是早上拍摄的话
en: If I film videos in the morning,

pinyin: wǒ jiù bù xū yào tè bié de bǔ guāng
zh-Hans: 我就不需要特别地补光
en: I don't need to set up any lighting

pinyin: ér qiě wǒ zhēn de fēi cháng xǐ huan zì rán guāng pāi chū lái de gǎn jué
zh-Hans: 而且我真的非常喜欢自然光拍出来的感觉
en: and also I really like filming with natural light

pinyin: zǒng 'ér yán zhī ne
zh-Hans: 总而言之呢
en: Anyway

pinyin: jiù shì wǒ duì zhè ge fáng jiān hěn mǎn yì
zh-Hans: 就是我对这个房间很满意
en: I'm really happy with the room

pinyin: ér qiě zhè biān zū jīn qí shí hěn pián yi
zh-Hans: 而且这边租金其实很便宜
en: And the rent is actually pretty cheap

pinyin: wǒ jué de zhěng tǐ lái shuō cp zhí mǎn gāo de
zh-Hans: 我觉得整体来说cp值满高的
en: I think overall it’s pretty worth it

pinyin: dàn shì yǒu xiē xiǎo wèn tí
zh-Hans: 但是有些小问题
en: There are just some minor issues

pinyin: xiàng shì zài chú fáng hái yǒu yù shì jiù yǒu bǐ jiào duō wèn tí
zh-Hans: 像是在厨房还有浴室就有比较多问题
en: in the kitchen and bathroom

pinyin: yǒu yī xiē dōng xi gù zhàng a
zh-Hans: 有一些东西故障啊
en: Like, some things aren't working

pinyin: hái yǒu shuǐ lóng tóu lòu shuǐ děng děng
zh-Hans: 还有水龙头漏水等等
en: and a faucet is leaking, etc.

pinyin: shì xū yào tè bié qù chǔ lǐ yī xià de
zh-Hans: 是需要特别去处理一下的
en: We need to take care of them

pinyin: dàn shì tā men zhè biān kě yǐ bào xiū
zh-Hans: 但是他们这边可以报修
en: but here there's a system where I can report issues

pinyin: huì yǒu gōng zuò rén yuán lái chǔ lǐ
zh-Hans: 会有工作人员来处理
en: and a staff member will come and fix things

pinyin: suǒ yǐ dào mù qián wéi zhǐ zhù qǐ lai jué de mǎn mǎn yì de
zh-Hans: 所以到目前为止住起来觉得满满意的
en: So I’ve been pretty satisfied so far

pinyin: méi yǒu shén me tài dà de wèn tí
zh-Hans: 没有什么太大的问题
en: There aren't very big issues

pinyin: hǎo la, nà xī wàng nǐ men xǐ huan jīn tiān de yǐng piàn
zh-Hans: 好啦，那希望你们喜欢今天的影片
en: Ok, I hope you enjoyed today's video

pinyin: wǒ men xià cì jiàn luō! bái bái!
zh-Hans: 我们下次见啰！拜拜！
en: See you next time! Bye!
